statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE id = 1 AND user_id = 100
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 101 AND page_id = 202;
DELETE FROM ad_placements WHERE advertiser_id = 303 AND ad_id = 404;
DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM website_traffic WHERE visit_date < '2022-01-01' AND visit_time < '08:00:00';
DELETE FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id = 50 AND ad_id = 10;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'click' AND engagement_timestamp < '2021-10-01';
